content: आसंसार, --संसृति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Liable to progress or alteration. --रं, --ति {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Till the end of the world or worldly existence; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Within the limits or range of worldly existence, throughout the sphere of worldly life; <ls>Bh. 3. 46</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 6</ls> (<ls>Malli.</ls> यावत्संसारं).
